title: ITSM Developer/ServiceNow
full_description: Great opportunity to join a leading manufacturer as an ITSM Developer. In this role you will provide administration, application development, maintenance, and technical support by using good practice web programming techniques to configure robust solutions to the client utilizing the ServiceNow platform.THIS IS A REMOTE BASED OPPORTUNITY.Requirements:• Experience in all phases of SDLC and project life cycle processes• Strong experience in Service Now platform as developer and administrator• Strong skill set in the ServiceNow suite development including CMS, SOAP/REST integration Service Catalogs, Update sets, Discovery, Business Rules, Workflow, and CMDB• Hands on experience on various IT Services of Service Now tool like Service Catalog Requests, Asset Management, Configuration Management, Service-Now Administration, Incident and Problem Management, Knowledge Management, Reporting, Integration with Web ServicesVolt is an equal opportunity employer.
